Package com.comp413.clientapi.server

Class ServerService

java.lang.Object
com.comp413.clientapi.server.ServerService
@Service public class ServerService extends Object
This is the server to hold state and handle requests.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> login(credentialsRequest request)
      Log a user in provided matching credentials. A cookie header is returned to the requester.
      Parameters:
      request - Necessary info to create a new user.
      Returns:
      Upon successful login, a brief message with a 200 OK status code is returned. A cookie is contained within the response.

    • register

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> register(credentialsRequest request)
      Register a user. The user's portfolioId is its unique identifier (for the time being - this setup must change). Upon collision of this unique identifier, the registration will not proceed and the user's data will not be updated or overwritten.
      Parameters:
      request - Necessary info to create a new user.
      Returns:
      Upon successful registration, a brief message with a 201 CREATED status code is returned.

    • cancelOrder

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> cancelOrder(String sessionId, String orderId)
      Cancel an order.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session cookie of logged-in user.
      orderId - Unique identifier associated with an order.
      Returns:
      Upon success, a brief message with a 200 OK code is returned.

    • placeMarketOrder

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> placeMarketOrder(marketOrderRequest request)
      Place a market order.
      Parameters:
      request - All the necessary information needed to process a market order.
      Returns:
      Upon success, a brief message with a 201 CREATED code is returned.

    • getPFValue

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getPFValue(String sessionId)
      Get portfolio value from DB.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session cookie of logged-in user.
      Returns:
      Valuation of portfolio.

    • getCash

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getCash(String sessionId)
      Returns total cash held in user's account.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session cookie of logged-in user.
      Returns:
      Cash in user's account.

    • getStock

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getStock(String symbol)
      Request the database for an individual stock's data.
      Parameters:
      symbol - Symbol of asset for which data are requested.
      Returns:
      If asset exists, the response contained data pertinent to the symbol.

    • getTransactionHistory

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getTransactionHistory(String sessionId)
      Get transaction data for a logged-in user from the database. CURRENTLY just fetches (pending) orders.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session cookie of logged-in user.
      Returns:
      List of (completed) transactions associated with the user.

    • getOrderHistory

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getOrderHistory(String sessionId)
      Get order data for a logged-in user from the database.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session cookie of logged-in user.
      Returns:
      List of (pending) orders associated with the user.

    • getHoldings

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getHoldings(String sessionId)
      List all assets held by a user.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - Session cookie of logged-in user.
      Returns:
      list of held assets.
